channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [SBG3][Dedicated Servers] - Rack S323A03 / S345B07
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 16, 08:00 - 11:00 UTC

Nov 27, 09:53 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 16/12/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 16/12/2024 11:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in rack S323A03 / S345B07 will be unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, our teams will move servers from rack S323A03 to S322A06 and S345B07 to S345B08.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [ERI1/SGP1/BHS8][Dedicated Servers] - Network equipment version upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 11, 15:00 - 19:00 UTC

Nov 29, 08:27 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled to update some network devices. It will affect our Baremetal offer.

Start time : 11/12/2024 15:00 UTC
End time : 11/12/2024 19:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a software upgrade on multiple network equipments.


Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 12A05
item.description:
Dec 1, 22:01 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 01/12/2024 20:55 UTC
End Time : 01/12/2024 22:58 UTC
Service impact : We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.
Root cause : Electrical disjunction

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Dec 1, 21:55 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
We remind you that the following impact is still present :

Service impact : A significant number of servers in the rack 12A05 are no longer responding.
Root cause : Electrical disjunction
Ongoing actions : Our teams is working to fix the issue.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Dec 1, 21:46 UTC
Investigating - An incident is in progress on our Bare Metal offer. It has temporarily affected the availability.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 01/12/2024 20:55 UTC
Service impact : A significant number of servers in the rack 12A05 are no longer responding.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Our teams are fully mobilized and actively working to resolve this problem.

We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [Global][Licensing] - DirectAdmin licence incident notification
item.description:
Nov 28, 09:33 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 27/11/2024 14:22 UTC
End time : 28/11/2024 08:30 UTC
Service status : We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.
Root cause : Our provider detected a malfunction and fixed it.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Nov 28, 09:15 UTC
Update - Workaround : If customers are facing issues with the licence directAdmin, they may execute the following command :
systemctl restart directadmin

Nov 28, 09:13 UTC

As soon as the situation evolves or the incident is resolved, we will keep you informed.

item.title: [EU][Managed Service] - Log and Data Plateform incident notification
item.description:
Nov 26, 14:42 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 26/11/2024 02:50 UTC
End time : 26/11/2024 14:05 UTC
Root cause : Incident due a misconfiguration on the network device.
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Nov 26, 10:51 UTC
Monitoring - LDP Public API is now fully up & running
Only the pay-as-you-go consumption report is now impacted, all other features work as expected.

A fix has been implemented and we are now monitoring the results.

Nov 26, 10:28 UTC
Identified - The services are more stable now, and our teams are continuing to work on the complete resolution.

Nov 26, 09:23 UTC
Investigating - Please be aware an incident is in progress on our Logs Data Platform offer. It this is currently affecting the functionality.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 26/11/2024 02:50 UTC
Service impact : Public API issue on Logs Data Platform service, customers are unable to create or modify their project during the incident.
Ongoing actions : Investigating

Our teams are fully mobilized and actively working to resolve this problem.

We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.
